item.title: Cross-referencing in Hugo
item.description: I have been spending quite a fair amount of time working with Hugo, especially on building this blog. Since then Hugo keeps amazing me with a plethora of nice features, ranging from systematic content structures, well-organised theming, to powerful templating, several useful functions and shortcodes. The documentation is quite rich and covers most of Hugo major aspects. Nonetheless, it is sometimes caught off-speed due to the incredible development progress made by amazing Hugo authors and contributors ❤️.
